name: 陳勇成
objective:
本課程主要目的在促進學生進一步瞭解檔案策展與加值應用之概念與方法，並著重於檔案典藏單位及其所典藏檔案之展示規劃及應用。透過本課程之授課內容，學生可培養以下幾個能力：（1）認識檔案策展之基本概念；（2）理解檔案加值應用之原則與倫理；（3）具備檔案評估、規劃及檔案資料應用之專業素養。
This course will introduce the basic concepts and practical issues in archives curating and value added. And then, focus on the exhibition planning and application of archives and archival material. By attending the class students will: (1) Understand basic concepts and methods of archives curation. (2) Gain in-deep understanding the principles and ethics of archives value added. (3) Possess the archival intelligence to use, evaluate and curate the archival material.
